entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:24 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
